file_content.text: My savior and avenger! My heart is light--almost as if I were alive again.
Your monster is quite impressive. In my day, he that possessed such a prize could have ruled the Sith.
Your monster is quite impressive. In my day, she that possessed such a prize could have ruled the Sith.
This is the heir of Kallig. Show respect.
You have a gift. The way you and your apprentice cut through my guardians was most satisfactory.
What was the point of having them attack us? Haven't we already proven ourselves to you?
You don't fail to impress. To accomplish so much with only a Force-less scoundrel at your side....
You're lucky you're already dead.
I'm sorry, but I've always been vain, and surrender is not a pill I swallow easily.
Attempts on my life are not a pill I swallow easily.
The feeling is mutual.
Surely a Sith must be used to fending off unwanted attacks. Or have the Sith become soft since my time?
Let's just get this over with.
As you say.
Before you perform the ritual, promise me that you will release me when your enemies are defeated and you no longer need my power.
I promise to free you when I have defeated my enemy, Darth Thanaton.
Let's make a deal.
More generous than I'd expected... but I would be a fool to ask for less.
Seal the promise with your blood, and I will submit willingly to your control.
I promise to release you once Thanaton is defeated.
Okay. [Shed blood.]
Excellent. Let the ritual begin....
I don't make promises to the likes of you.
Are you kidding? [Force him.]
Sorry, the sight of my own blood makes me squeamish.
Disgusting. [Force him.]
I won't be taken easily!
I don't have time for this.
